variables.name: Age
variables.description: Age of the individual in years

variables.name: BMI
variables.description: Body Mass Index (kg/mÂ²), a measure of body fat based on height and weight

variables.name: Menstrual_Irregularity
variables.description: Indicates presence of irregular menstrual cycles (1 = Yes, 0 = No)

variables.name: Testosterone_Level(ng/dL)
variables.description: Serum testosterone level in nanograms per deciliter

variables.name: Antral_Follicle_Count
variables.description: Number of antral follicles observed via ultrasound, a marker for PCOS

variables.name: PCOS_Diagnosis
variables.description: Indicates whether the individual is diagnosed with PCOS (1 = Yes, 0 = No)
